text: //ehema wenna da awashya?//
ewan uthumeku sihinokota samariya haki wesak mangalayayak thibiya hakida?

kese wuwath apata swabhawadharmaya wenas kala nohaka.

nethu piyena thuru bala innam nil nethaga yali dakinna...kakirawanuwanthika chathuranganipi්rayankarathwaya upathin labuwada suwandin thora mal kakulu epa hadawatha pathule wisakatu sagawuna boruwata hinahena muhunu epathalahene anura pandukabhaya balasuriyanumbaata mata nolabena dehade api thathu soyamu hamuwela lanwela himinowi api indimu wenwenna harayanna waru nathiyen thawemu sansare gaman maga yalidu api hamu nowemu...nadira roshini nallaperumakarthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

awasana washayen kiwahakke sarath gunarathna pamanak nowa nimal lansada rajapakshalage odokkuwata watenne nathiwa mahajanayage niyojithayin wuye nam mewan wipath nowenu atha yannaya. 03/01/17.

“boho ratawala siduwuye bihisunu thathwayanya.
janadhipathi pathkaranawa yayi ki widwath kamituwa ada heta path karanawa da?
apitanam ithin oya
nilgala, dambaana wani pradeshawala ape parani muthunmiththan jiwath wu nisa prag aithihasika watinakamak thikhenawa.
"wathura nathi kanthare " pahu karanna wathura wadipura aran giyama hari wage.".

kamarun, rusiyanu, pakisthana athulu ratawal kihipayaka pudgalayan ekwi shri lankawa thula wyaja dolar nottu nipadawime jawaramak pilibanda me wana wita polisiyata thorathuru labi thibe.kolambaa, migamuwa, nuwara athulu shri lankawe pradhana nagara aashrithawa jawarama sidu kara gena yana bawa pawase.

sthuthiyi ayiye awith giyata.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~chapa akka : owu owu matath kiyanna thiyanne oyalage sadde damillata jaya wewa kiyala thama.aayeth ahala.oya oonayiyalata,dumi ayiyalata ehema obama sadde danne liyapalla kiyala.eeta passene eyala liyanne.mewa bayata liyawena post.hik hik.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~thanoja nanda : meka aththa kathawa.mama eda indanma me tika tika liyanne ee kathawa.gothapu kathawak wage neda?eeth meka thamayi aththa.aaye kattiya hamba una welawaka me liyaddi amathaka una than ekkama kiyannamko ehenam.
meka samanyayen dayiw ekak, joyint ekak wani namakin handinwiya haki thanak.
ee madiwata thawa tiken nada yanna kotabanna wenawane arugen..
wenas nowunoth mulu ratema pisso wadiwena eka thamayi wenne.

kadu mudunwalata naga tharamaka mahansiya nisa gatha sitha niwaganimata sini hakuru kallak samanga unusum belimal koppayak rasabalamin apa samanga katha bahata watunu kada himiya pawasuwe uthsawaya samaye saha sathi anthaye harennata anek dinawala salakiya yuthu mudalak upaya ganima asiru bawayi.
sama deshapalanaya sandaha sama wyapruthi wisin dakwana ladde awama dayakathwayaki.
me charithaye pitathin penena kathawa nemeyi athulathin thiyenne.

me samangama ee dina deka thula sidu karana katayuthu walata wadi wadagathkamak labi atha.
punchi kale api jiwath wuneth me widihata janapaden labagaththa punchi niwesaka” waidyathuma kiyanawa.nawasiya panas hathe nowambar mase wisi ata wanida ohu melowa eliya dutuwe kahawaththa rohale di.

rakna lanka samagame wathman sabhapathi wiktar samarawira mahatha labana 14 wani dina barapathala wancha dushana, rajya sampath awabhawithaya pilibanda janadhipathi wimarshana komisamata kandawa athi bawa wartha we.
dawasin dawasa ape uthumano nirbhithawa, thamanta oona de, thamanta oona minissunta karanawa.
hu ema adahasa wada manapiya wa da sawanapiya wa da melesa pawasuha:
ohuta nam walantayin yanu welanda umathuwaki gasa kamaki kathawa sathyaya.eya ese nowe yayi kiyanna mage athdakim thulinda apahasuya.
kalin lipiyen mama kiwwane kampas ekata giya palaweni dawasema ape purupuruta windinna sidda wechcha athdakim gana.

“pita sakwala jiwihu athara “dura bahara graha lowaka ipida, jiwana chakraya ha in midima gana margopadeshakathwaya dun maha pandi ruwanak sarana giya kottashayak wethi.
me shloka laksha hathara thaba eyin alukkalak wath danna ayaku me wakawanuwe soyaganimata sitithayi sithiya nohakiya.
yalukama mithudama kiyana ekath sagarayak wage sankalpayak.

madhyama parisara adhikariye karyaya mandalaya athara anthar pudgala sabandatha wardhanaya kirima aramunu karaganimin, aayathanaye, subasadhaka sangamaya wisin warshikawa sanwidhanaya karanu labana, sahallu pandu, suhada krikat tharagaya pasugiyada baththaramulla, buddhadasa kridanganayedi pawathwana ladi.
tharuna sewa sabhawe natum kandayamath thama narthanayen me prasangaya hada karanawa.
thaththa wisthare kiyapu para mata aaye kalekata thaththage ofis eka paththe yanna bari una...

nangi patan gaththa..

ee nisa api ethumagenuth illa sitinawa, ‘kawara badhaka thibunath me rate nathi karapu pathalayata yali hisa osawanna denna epa!’

ee athara sisunge wibhaga samathwime awama lakunu pramanaya thawath pahala damime yojanawa usas pela ada arambae subhashini senanayaka adhyayana podu sahathika pathra usas pela 2012 wasara wibhagaya ada (6) aarambha kere.
ese wuwath ape kathawehi (batahira widyawehi da aththe katha pamanaki) adala karunehi di aasanet wisawimata kalsiyam aasanet thibiya yuthu ya.

oya 2012 kiyanne dakunu saha madhyama amarikan kalapa wala indala samula ghathanaya wela giya jathin kihipayak poduwe kiyapu anawaki kihipayak awasana karapu than allagena, eewa ape kalandar kala walata pariwarthanaya karagena hada gaththu wikarayak…
welawakata kussiyath hariyata maya lokayak wage.
pawula ariya wage mallilage, bappala, puthalage hotal’ idam amathyawaraya ese kiya sitiye sanduda pawathi thrikunamala disthrik sanwardhana kamitu raswimata sahabhagi wemin.
wimal saha gammanpila gotabhayama illayi.
mata thiyenne erikoge molene..
nathi thanak kiwa nohaki tharamin wyaptha wi dinen dina athu rikili dama wardhanaya wemin pawathina athara, kisidu ho salakiyayuthu adu wimak athayi kiwa nohaki ya.
engalanthaye notinham sita ena abhimananiya bayisikal.
siyaluma wruththinta wada guru wruththiya usasya.
